DONT-CHANGE-ANYTHING-IN-THIS-FILE: DONT CHANGE ANYTHING IN THIS FILE UNLESS YOU KNOW WHAT YOU'RE DOING
versionText:
This topic branch adds a new ai model. This ai model is simulation based, so it plays every card in it's hand in a simulation of the game in order to find the best card.

THIS AI MODEL IS UNFINISHED. IT IS IN THE FIRST PASS AND SO EXPECT MEMORY LEAKS, CRASHES AND BUGS. THIS MODEL TAKES FOREVER, USES UP A LOT OF MEMORY, AND CURRENTLY THE ONLY IMPLEMENTED ACTIONS THE AI CAN DO IS PLAY CARDS, ATTACK, SELECT TARGETS, DISCOVER, DREDGE. EVERYTHING ELSE IS HANDLED BY THE PREVIOUS MODEL.

Play cards: Enable the new ai model to play cards / choose to attack / choose to hero power / choose to end their turn.
Attack: Enable the new ai model to attack.
Select targets: Enable the new ai model to select targets.
Discover: Enable the new ai model to Discover a card.
Dredge: Enable the new ai model to choose a card to Dredge.
Choose one: Enable the new ai model to choose an option from a list.
Question: not done
Enable the new ai model to answer basic questions.
Yes / No question: Enable the new ai model to answer yes / no questions.
Trade: Enable the new ai model to choose to trade cards.
Mulligan: Enable the new ai model to Mulligan cards.
Fix tests: Fix the ai tests defined in `test/ai.test.js`.
Fix todos / fixme's: Fix `todo`'s and `fixme`'s in the new ai model's code.
Add prefix to ai config keys: Add a `sim` or `sent` or `simsent` prefix to the ai options to indicate which ai model(s) changing the option changes.
Finalize: Do all remaining tasks and put it in a beta state.
